cleaned_text: About this Product Our Meditation moisturizing lotion stick delivers targeted ultra-hydration to dry, itchy areas of the body like elbows, knees, and heels of your feet. Our ultra-nourishing lotion sticks check several boxes: it's mess-free, non-greasy, fast-absorbing, cruelty-free, free of chemicals and fake lab-made ingredients, and super portable that you can stash it basically anywhere. Our handmade in small batches lotion balm sticks when applied to skin that needs hydration and moisture boost will melt into your skin and is filled with all-star ingredients: Cocoa Butter, Shea Butter, Sweet Almond Oil, Apricot Kernel Oil, Organic Jojoba Oil, Coconut Oil, Ohio Beeswax for Our Hives, Arrow Root, Vitamin E Oil, and a Proprietary blend of Therapeutic Essential Oils. Helps you ditch dryness whether you're a frequent hand-washer or you're just battling flaky skin. You can even use it as a lip balm, and a little goes a long way! Scent: Meditation - Scent Description: Our Meditation scent blend reminds me of Thailand. Our proprietary blend of therapeutic essential oils can help to center, ground, calm, and focus the mind; along with calming the body to help reduce negative energy and self-talk from the body and mind by encouraging insightful, elevating feelings of positivity, gratitude, and self-respect. How to Use: Turn the dial at bottom of the twist-up tube to push up hard nourishing lotion for easy apply lotion. Massage onto skin where you need it, and the beeswax will help to lock in the moisture for hours. At Happy Honey Bee Co., the journey is rooted in a lifelong love for nature, animals, and the incredible world of honeybees. From the moment Stephanie can remember, the allure of these tiny pollinators captured her heart. This deep connection to the hive and a childhood filled with wonder paved the path for a remarkable venture that beautifully blends artistry with a buzzing passion for ethical beekeeping. Nestled in the heart of our little farm, the story of Happy Honey Bee Co. began to unfold. It was on this quaint county haven that Stephanie's true calling took flight. With unwavering determination, she embarked on a journey to not only craft exquisite, eco-friendly products straight from the hive but also to champion the cause of the honeybees that are vital to our planet's well-being. Stephanie's dedication blossomed into a thriving haven for these marvelous creatures. What began as a single hive and a dream quickly flourished into a sanctuary of over 50 hives and counting today. Our hives hum with life, mirroring the vibrant energy that infuses each handcrafted beeswax candle, delicate ornament, nourishing lotion, and delectable raw honey that graces our collection. Every creation embodies the essence of Stephanie's unwavering commitment to sustainable beekeeping, a passion that has caught the attention of magazines, newspapers, tv-shows, and hearts across the nation. Yet, Happy Honey Bee Co. is more than just products; it's a heartbeat reverberating through the pollinator gardens where Stephanie nurtures both blossoms and minds. Guiding local school children and after-school clubs through the magical world of honeybees, she plants seeds of understanding and stewardship for our delicate ecosystem. Join us on this exquisite journey, where each Happy Honey Bee Co. creation is a testament to the unwavering dedication to ethical beekeeping, nature's harmony, and the artistry that stems from a lifelong fascination with honeybees. Welcome to our hive, where passion, purpose, and the sweet symphony of bees converge. How it's Made Our Solid Lotion Stick formula bears the legacy of over two decades, a testament to the mastery we've honed over time. Our perfected solid lotion blend embodies our unwavering commitment to excellence, a tribute to the harmonious fusion of tradition and innovation. Embrace the embrace of our Solid Lotion Sticks - where the beauty of nature intertwines with human artistry, resulting in a tactile experience that's as enriching as it is luxurious. With every application, you're invited to savor years of dedication, leaving your skin with a radiant, supple glow that stands as a testament to the beauty that can only arise from the union of nature and craftsmanship.
